Title: An End to Beginnings
Description:
It's time for us to head back to Stormwind, now that reinforcements have arrived and the storm has passed.

You and the other recruits have been invaluable in this operation, $n. I'll make sure to include that in my report to the king.

Hop on a gryphon. Let's go home.
ObjectivesText: Ride an Alliance Gryphon to Stormwind City.
RewardText:
It's good to be back in Stormwind. 

I must report our mission's success to the king, but I have an idea for what you can do in the meantime...

Objectives.Text: Alliance Gryphon rode back to Stormwind City
